languages.text: {n}Ваши слова о долге и жертвенности гремят под сводами часовни, приводя людей в религиозный экстаз. Они приносят обеты перед ликом Его, каются в грехах и отдают все до последнего трона в чашу для пожертвований.{/n}

{n}Your words of duty and sacrifice ring out beneath the chapel's vaulted roof, leaving your listeners ecstatic. They start swearing sacred oaths before His image, professing remorse for their misdeeds, and depositing everything they have, down to the last throne, in the offering plate.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваши слова о долге и жертвенности гремят под сводами часовни, приводя людей в религиозный экстаз. Они приносят обеты перед ликом Его, каются в грехах и отдают все до последнего трона в чашу для пожертвований.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your words of duty and sacrifice roar within the chapel's walls, leaving your listeners ecstatic. They start swearing sacred oaths before His image, professing remorse for their misdeeds, and placing everything they have to the last throne in the offering plate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deine Worte über Pflicht und Opferbereitschaft hallen durch das Kuppeldach der Kapelle und begeistern deine Zuhörer. Sie fangen an, heilige Eide vor Seinem Bild zu schwören, bekunden Reue für ihre Sünden und legen ihre gesamten Habseligkeiten in die Opferschale.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words of duty and sacrifice ring out beneath the chapel's vaulted roof, leaving your listeners ecstatic. They start swearing sacred oaths before His image, professing remorse for their misdeeds, and depositing everything they have, down to the last throne, in the offering plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Deine Worte über Pflicht und Opferbereitschaft hallen durch das Kuppeldach der Kapelle und begeistern deine Zuhörer. Sie fangen an, heilige Eide vor Seinem Bild zu schwören, bekunden Reue für ihre Sünden und legen ihre gesamten Habseligkeiten in die Opferschale.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Votre sermon sur le devoir et le sacrifice résonne sous la voûte de la chapelle et subjugue votre auditoire. Très vite, vous entendez des serments sacrés prononcés devant Son image et des professions de remords. Devant le plat d'offrande défilent tous vos sujets, qui y versent jusqu'à leur dernier trône.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words of duty and sacrifice ring out beneath the chapel's vaulted roof, leaving your listeners ecstatic. They start swearing sacred oaths before His image, professing remorse for their misdeeds, and depositing everything they have, down to the last throne, in the offering plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Votre sermon sur le devoir et le sacrifice résonne sous la voûte de la chapelle et subjugue votre auditoire. Très vite, vous entendez des serments sacrés prononcés devant Son image et des professions de remords. Devant le plat d'offrande défilent tous vos sujets, qui y versent jusqu'à leur dernier trône.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tu declamación sobre el deber y el sacrificio reverbera bajo el techo abovedado de la capilla, cautivando por completo a la congregación. Los fieles prorrumpen en juramentos sagrados ante Su imagen, arrepintiéndose de sus desmanes y depositando todas sus pertenencias, hasta el último trono, en la bandeja de exvotos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words of duty and sacrifice ring out beneath the chapel's vaulted roof, leaving your listeners ecstatic. They start swearing sacred oaths before His image, professing remorse for their misdeeds, and depositing everything they have, down to the last throne, in the offering plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tu declamación sobre el deber y el sacrificio reverbera bajo el techo abovedado de la capilla, cautivando por completo a la congregación. Los fieles prorrumpen en juramentos sagrados ante Su imagen, arrepintiéndose de sus desmanes y depositando todas sus pertenencias, hasta el último trono, en la bandeja de exvotos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}礼拝堂の丸天井の下で、あなたの使命と犠牲について語る言葉が響き渡り、聴衆を恍惚とさせる。彼らは主の御影の前で神聖な誓いを立て、悪行を反省し、最後の王座に至るまで、所持しているすべてのものを献金皿へと預け始める。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words of duty and sacrifice ring out beneath the chapel's vaulted roof, leaving your listeners ecstatic. They start swearing sacred oaths before His image, professing remorse for their misdeeds, and depositing everything they have, down to the last throne, in the offering plate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}礼拝堂の丸天井の下で、あなたの使命と犠牲について語る言葉が響き渡り、聴衆を恍惚とさせる。彼らは主の御影の前で神聖な誓いを立て、悪行を反省し、最後の王座に至るまで、所持しているすべてのものを献金皿へと預け始める。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你进行了一场关于责任与牺牲的布道。你的话语回荡在礼拜堂中，所有听众都听得斗志昂扬。所有人都在帝皇的神像前许下了庄重的誓言，对自己过去犯下的罪行表示悔恨，把身上所有东西都放在了献祭的盘子里，一个王座币都没有留下。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words of duty and sacrifice ring out beneath the chapel's vaulted roof, leaving your listeners ecstatic. They start swearing sacred oaths before His image, professing remorse for their misdeeds, and depositing everything they have, down to the last throne, in the offering plate.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vazifeye ve fedakârlığa dair sözlerin şapelin kubbesinin altında yankılanıyor ve dinleyenlerin içini coşkuyla dolduruyor. O'nun hayalinin önünde kutsal yeminler etmeye, günahları için af dilemeye ve ellerinde avuçlarında ne varsa, son geltlerine kadar adak haznesine yerleştirmeye başlıyorlar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your words of duty and sacrifice ring out beneath the chapel's vaulted roof, leaving your listeners ecstatic. They start swearing sacred oaths before His image, professing remorse for their misdeeds, and depositing everything they have, down to the last throne, in the offering plate.{/n}
